summary: The diff implements both backend filtering logic to reschedule only incomplete revisions and frontend UI updates to reflect this behavior. Backend changes filter out completed revisions (reviewStatuses[i] = true) when rescheduling, and frontend updates include tooltip explanation and feedback toast showing incomplete revision count.

hallucinated_features.description: Added migration.mo file with identity migration function
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest has no requirement for migration functionality or data migration. This appears to be scaffolding or infrastructure code not requested in the specification.
